signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.pageDescription: Sign in to your Outfitly account to access your wardrobe and outfits.
signIn.heading: Welcome Back!
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to continue to your wardrobe

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.pageDescription: Create your Outfitly account and start organizing your wardrobe today.
signUp.heading: Create Your Account
signUp.subtitle: Join Outfitly and start designing your perfect wardrobe

HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.description: Discover your personal style with Outfitly. Organize your wardrobe, explore outfit ideas, and elevate your fashion game.

hero.subheading: Upload your wardrobe, let AI curate perfect outfits, or design manually. Join a vibrant community sharing and celebrating style together.

video.heading: See Your Style Come to Life
video.subtitle: Watch how Outfitly transforms your wardrobe experience

aiStyling.title: AI-Powered Styling
aiStyling.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your wardrobe and creates stunning outfit combinations tailored to your style and occasions. Get personalized recommendations based on weather, events, and your preferences.

manualDesign.title: Manual Design
manualDesign.description: Take full creative control. Mix and match items from your wardrobe to create unique looks that express your personality. Drag, drop, and visualize your perfect outfit.

socialCommunity.title: Social Community
socialCommunity.description: Share your outfits, get inspired by others, and engage with a vibrant community of fashion enthusiasts worldwide. Follow trends, save favorites, and build your style network.

smartWardrobe.title: Smart Wardrobe
smartWardrobe.description: Upload and organize your entire wardrobe digitally. Never forget what you own and make the most of every piece. Track wear history and discover underutilized items.

testimonials.heading: Loved by Fashion Enthusiasts
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands who've transformed their style journey with Outfitly
testimonials.highlight: Game changer for my daily styling

Wardrobe.pageDescription: Manage your wardrobe items. Add, edit, and organize your clothing collection all in one place.
Wardrobe.heading: My Wardrobe
Wardrobe.subtitle: Manage and organize your fashion collection

addNew.title: Add New Item
addNew.ariaLabel: Add a new item to the wardrobe

addItem.pageDescription: Add a new item to your wardrobe collection.
addItem.heading: Add Item to Wardrobe
addItem.subtitle: Upload photos and details of your new item

editItem.heading: Update Item to Wardrobe
editItem.subtitle: Edit uploaded photos and details of your item

form.notesPlaceholder: Add any additional notes about this item...

errors.couldNotLoad: We couldn't load your wardrobe items. This might be a temporary issue.

listCard.uploadDescription: Upload a new piece to your wardrobe

Explore.pageDescription: Explore outfit ideas and get inspired. Discover new styles and trends to elevate your wardrobe.
Explore.heading: Explore Outfits
Explore.subtitle: Discover inspiring looks from the community

AIGenerator.pageDescription: Let AI design your perfect outfit based on occasion, weather, and style preferences.
AIGenerator.heading: AI Style Assistant
AIGenerator.subtitle: Let artificial intelligence design your perfect outfit

config.heading: Configure Your Perfect Look
config.subtitle: Select your preferences and let AI do the magic

form.requirementsPlaceholder: E.g., prefer darker colors, need comfortable shoes...

Weather.subtitle: Dress perfectly for the weather conditions

brand.description: Your smart wardrobe companion. Discover, create, and share amazing outfits with the power of AI and community.

newsletter.heading: Stay in Style
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest trends, tips, and exclusive offers
